dcterms:description: A dataset containing articles from American news sites, classified as hyperpartisan or non-hyperpartisan. Includes training and validation sets, with some articles classified individually by humans. Data is provided in XML format with IDs, titles, URLs, publication times, and publisher bias information.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 4 Dataset
